title: BANNED BOYS

replies.body: dude, the "i got banned but its not my fault" cliche is old
I mean it's not as If i'm saying I did nothing wrong, just seems abit childish riot bans people for talking shit in a video game.
Is it not childish to talk shit in a video game in the first place? So people want to be able to enjoy a community in a game they love, is that really such a bad thing?
Was that a single match? That's too much, even if you are being positive.
YES YOU CANNOT CALL THE GUY SINGLE HANDIEDLY RUINING YOUR GAME A SPASTIC FUCKING C*UNT, A GUY WHO IS REFUSING TO GROUP WITH EVERYONE AND REFUSING TO TEAM FIGHT AND CALLING EVERYONE GARBAGE YES DUDE

> [{quoted}](name=Url,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RpVEoM0M,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-02-05T00:41:17.791+0000)
>
> YES YOU CANNOT CALL THE GUY SINGLE HANDIEDLY RUINING YOUR GAME A SPASTIC FUKING C*UNT, A GUY WHO IS REFUSING TO GROUP WITH EVERYONE AND REFUSING TO TEAM FIGHT AND CALLING EVERYONE GARBAGE YES DUDE

Seems to me that you deserve the ban.
Such primary school mentality. Bully instigates, victim hits back. Victim gets punished

The "victim" is causing more problems and more victims. You don't even know if the instigator was going through something at home; he could be having some serious issues causing him to take it out on others in game. While what that person did is not acceptable, neither is becoming a problem in retaliation.

But if someone bumps into you in the hallway, and you full on punch them back, who deserves the punishment? All we have is his word. We don't know if the other guy was toxic or not.

And if someone punches you, and you punch them back, you've still punched someone. If we can't learn to take responsibility for our actions then we make a pretty poor example of what sentient can mean.
At least you didn't get banned for the BS that I just got banned for tbh.
i mean lets be real all i did was call a guy a fucking cancer %%%% in a video game.
